page.title: 16TRAFFIC SURVEY A616,KNEESALL
page.content:
{NEWARK TO OLLERTON} 2:OOpm_3:00 we counted,67 cars,8 lorries,1 bus,2 motor bikes,8 vans and 2 special vehicles.The total count was 88 vehicles.
The total count for Newark to Ollerton from 9:00 to 3:00pm was five hundred and twenty seven.
The total count for Ollerton to Newark from 9:00pm to 3:00pm was six hundred and fifteen. The complete count from 9:00am to 3:00pm both ways was,one thousand one hundred and forty two.
In conclusion, the{heaviest traffic} was travelling{southwards}perhaps going to the{market}that is held every Wednesday in Newark or was{coal}being taken from the collieries at Ollerton.
